description: Symbolic model checker extending NuSMV with advanced algorithms for infinite-state systems, IC3/PDR, and SMT-based verification

common_errors.pattern: BDD.*too large|out of memory|state space explosion
common_errors.cause: Model has too many reachable states for BDD-based techniques to handle efficiently
common_errors.solution: Use SAT-based bounded model checking (check_ltlspec_bmc). Try IC3/PDR algorithms (check_invar_ic3). Apply cone-of-influence reduction. Use abstraction.

common_errors.cause: Using integer/real variables with BDD algorithms that only support finite domains
common_errors.solution: Use SMT-based algorithms for infinite state (set on_failure_script_qelim). Bound integers to finite ranges. Use IC3 for infinite-state properties.

common_errors.cause: LTL property violated; counterexample shows a prefix leading to a loop (lasso-shaped trace)
common_errors.solution: Analyze the lasso: prefix shows how to reach the loop, loop shows the repeating violation. Fix model or refine property.

common_errors.pattern: syntax error in property|parse error in SPEC|invalid LTL formula
common_errors.cause: LTL/CTL property specification has syntax errors or uses unsupported operators
common_errors.solution: Check operator syntax (G, F, X, U for LTL; AG, AF, AX, AU, EG... for CTL). Parenthesize correctly. Use atomic propositions defined in model.
common_errors.example: LTLSPEC G (request -> F grant)  -- always request leads to grant

common_errors.pattern: property holds vacuously|unfair counterexample|need fairness constraint
common_errors.cause: Property appears satisfied but only because unfair (unrealistic) infinite paths are considered
common_errors.solution: Add FAIRNESS constraints to exclude unrealistic paths. Use COMPASSION for strong fairness. Verify counterexamples are realistic.
common_errors.example: FAIRNESS running  -- exclude paths where 'running' is always false

best_practices: Start with invariant checking (simpler) before full LTL
Use BMC for quick bug finding, IC3 for complete verification
Apply cone-of-influence reduction for large models
Add fairness constraints for liveness properties
Use SMT backend (go_msat) for infinite-state systems
